name: cifti-export-dense-mapping
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Write index to element mapping as text.

This command produces text files that describe the mapping from cifti indices to surface vertices or voxels.  All indices are zero-based.  The default format for -surface is lines of the form:

<cifti-index> <vertex>

The default format for -volume and -volume-all is lines of the form:

<cifti-index> <i> <j> <k>

For each <structure> argument, use one of the following strings:

CORTEX_LEFT
CORTEX_RIGHT
CEREBELLUM
ACCUMBENS_LEFT
ACCUMBENS_RIGHT
ALL_GREY_MATTER
ALL_WHITE_MATTER
AMYGDALA_LEFT
AMYGDALA_RIGHT
BRAIN_STEM
CAUDATE_LEFT
CAUDATE_RIGHT
CEREBELLAR_WHITE_MATTER_LEFT
CEREBELLAR_WHITE_MATTER_RIGHT
CEREBELLUM_LEFT
CEREBELLUM_RIGHT
CEREBRAL_WHITE_MATTER_LEFT
CEREBRAL_WHITE_MATTER_RIGHT
CORTEX
DIENCEPHALON_VENTRAL_LEFT
DIENCEPHALON_VENTRAL_RIGHT
HIPPOCAMPUS_LEFT
HIPPOCAMPUS_RIGHT
INVALID
OTHER
OTHER_GREY_MATTER
OTHER_WHITE_MATTER
PALLIDUM_LEFT
PALLIDUM_RIGHT
PUTAMEN_LEFT
PUTAMEN_RIGHT
THALAMUS_LEFT
THALAMUS_RIGHT

inputs.name: direction
inputs.description: which direction to export the mapping from, ROW or COLUMN

inputs.name: volume_all
inputs.description: export the the mapping of all voxels

type.name: volume_all
type.description: export the the mapping of all voxels

inputs.name: opt_no_cifti_index
inputs.description: don't write the cifti index in the output file

inputs.name: opt_structure
inputs.description: write the structure each voxel belongs to in the output file

inputs.name: surface
inputs.description: export the the mapping of one surface structure

type.name: surface
type.description: export the the mapping of one surface structure

inputs.name: opt_no_cifti_index
inputs.description: don't write the cifti index in the output file

inputs.name: volume
inputs.description: export the the mapping of one volume structure

type.name: volume
type.description: export the the mapping of one volume structure

inputs.name: opt_no_cifti_index
inputs.description: don't write the cifti index in the output file
